00027 #define ZDP_USER_DESC_FIELD_SIZE  16
00028 
00029 // These defines are used only during preprocessor phase. Please use DeviceType_t enumeration values instead.
00030 #define DEV_TYPE_COORDINATOR 0
00031 #define DEV_TYPE_ROUTER 1
00032 #define DEV_TYPE_ENDDEVICE 2
00033 
00034 /********************************************************************************
00035 * Base types
00036 ********************************************************************************/

00040 typedef uint16_t GroupAddr_t;
00041 typedef uint8_t  StackProfile_t;

00048 BEGIN_PACK
00050 
00051 typedef struct PACK
00052 {
00053   LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(4, (
00059     uint8_t   logicalType : 3,
00061     uint8_t   complexDescriptorAvailable: 1,
00063     uint8_t   userDescriptorAvailable: 1,
00065     uint8_t   reserved: 3
00066   ))
00067 
00068   LITTLE_ENDIAN_OCTET(2, (
00070     uint8_t   apsFlags : 3,
00077     uint8_t   frequencyBand : 5
00078   ))
00079 
00088   MAC_CapabilityInf_t  macCapbFlags;
00089 
00091   uint16_t manufacturerCode;
00092 
00095   uint8_t maxBufferSize;
00096 
00101   uint16_t maxTransferSize;
00102 
00113   uint16_t serverMask;
00114 
00118   uint16_t maxOutcTransferSize;
00119 
00124   uint8_t descriptorCapabilityField;
00125 } NodeDescriptor_t;
00126 
00128 
00129 typedef struct PACK
00130 {
00136   uint8_t currentPowerMode : 4;
00142   uint8_t availablePowerSources : 4;
00148   uint8_t currentPowerSource : 4;
00155   uint8_t currentPowerSourceLevel : 4;
00156 } PowerDescriptor_t;
00157 
00159 
00160 typedef struct PACK
00161 {
00164   Endpoint_t   endpoint;
00166   ProfileId_t  AppProfileId;
00168   uint16_t     AppDeviceId;
00170   uint8_t      AppDeviceVersion : 4;
00172   uint8_t      Reserved         : 4;
00175   uint8_t      AppInClustersCount;
00177   ClusterId_t* AppInClustersList;
00180   uint8_t      AppOutClustersCount;
00182   ClusterId_t* AppOutClustersList;
00183 } SimpleDescriptor_t;
00184 
00186

00188 {

00192 } UserDescriptor_t;
